trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é um predecessor do atual <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is a descendant of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> if it is positioned on a descendant node of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é um predecessor do atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>se está posicionado num nó subordinado do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> atual</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Take, for example, the following XML string: `<item><name>widget</name></item>` If the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `item` node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is positioned on the `name` node, IsDescendant returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Tirar, por exemplo, a seguinte cadeia XML: `<item><name>widget</name></item>` se atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no `item` nó e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>especificado está posicionado no `name` nó, IsDescendant devolve `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve sempre `false` sob as seguintes condições: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>partilhas especificadas, a implementação mas pontos de um documento diferente mesma instância que o navegador atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified has a different implementation than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>especificada tem uma implementação diferente para que o navegador atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para comparar a este <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é um predecessor do atual <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current node is an empty element without an end element tag.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o nó atual é um elemento vazio sem uma tag de elemento de fim.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the difference between the following different elements.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite-lhe determinar a diferença entre os seguintes elementos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: |Element|IsEmptyElement Value| |-------------|--------------------------| |`<item num="123"/>`|`true`| |`<item num="123">test</item>`|`false`| |`<item num="123"></item>`|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Elemento | Valor de IsEmptyElement | |-------------|--------------------------| | `<item num="123"/>`|`true`| | `<item num="123">test</item>`|`false`| |`<item num="123"></item>`|`false`|

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node is an empty element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó atual é um elemento vazio; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the current node represents an XPath node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó atual representa um nó XPath.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is at the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, determina se atual <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está na mesma posição especificada como <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IsSamePosition method assumes that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation and is points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O método IsSamePosition parte do princípio de que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>especificado partilha a mesma implementação e é pontos na mesma instância de documento atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve sempre `false` sob as seguintes condições:- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>especificar partilhas de implementação mas pontos de uma instância de documento diferente que atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> o mesmo</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem uma implementação diferente para a atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para comparar a este <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects have the same position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dois <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objetos têm a mesma posição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*> of the current node without any namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>do nó atual sem um prefixo de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The local name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O nome local devolvido depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the local name for the `<bk:book>` element is `book`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome local para o `<bk:book>` elemento é `book`.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the LocalName property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista o valor devolvido pela propriedade LocalName, com base no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the attribute.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The prefix associated with the namespace URI.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The target of the processing instruction.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | O valor da propriedade | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O nome local do elemento. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O nome local do atributo. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O prefixo associado com o URI do espaço de nomes. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O destino de instrução de processamento. | | Todos os outros <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós |<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. |</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the local name of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o nome local do nó atual, ou <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> se o nó atual não tem um nome (por exemplo, nós de texto ou comentário).</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI for the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o URI do espaço de nomes para o prefixo especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the currently assigned default namespace URI is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `prefix` parâmetro, o espaço de nomes predefinido atualmente atribuído é devolvido o URI.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no default namespace URI is explicitly assigned, and <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the blank prefix is associated with elements that are not in any namespace, and <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum espaço de nomes predefinido URI explicitamente atribuído, e <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `prefix` parâmetro, o prefixo em branco está associado a elementos que não se encontra no espaço de nomes, e <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>é devolvido.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The prefix to namespace URI mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O prefixo para mapeamentos URI do espaço de nomes pode alterar a partir de um nó para o nó num documento XML.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupNamespace method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o valor do método LookupNamespace pode não ser consistente de um nó para o seguinte.

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you want to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo cujo espaço de nomes URI que pretende resolver.

trans-unit.source: To match the default namespace, pass <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer corresponder o espaço de nomes predefinido, transmitir <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace URI assigned to the namespace prefix specified; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no namespace URI is assigned to the prefix specified.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o espaço de nomes URI atribuído ao espaço de nomes prefixo especificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum espaço de nomes URI é atribuído para o prefixo especificado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>devolvido é atomizado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix declared for the specified namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o prefixo declarado para o URI de espaço de nomes especificado.

trans-unit.source: The LookupPrefix method returns the first prefix that matches the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: O método de LookupPrefix devolve o primeiro prefixo que corresponda ao espaço de nomes URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: Multiple prefixes referring to the same namespace URI are not ordered in any particular way, so a particular prefix may not be returned each time when more than one is assigned.
trans-unit.target: Vários prefixos que faz referência ao mesmo espaço de nomes URI não ordenadas de qualquer forma específica, para que um determinado prefixo não pode ser devolvido sempre quando mais do que um é atribuído.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Namespace URI to prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > URI de espaço de nomes para mapeamentos de prefixo pode alterar a partir de um nó para o nó num documento XML.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupPrefix method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o valor do método LookupPrefix pode não ser consistente de um nó para o seguinte.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to resolve for the prefix.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI para resolver para o prefixo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace prefix assigned to the namespace URI specified; otherwise, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if no prefix is assigned to the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o prefixo de espaço de nomes atribuído ao espaço de nomes URI especificado; caso contrário, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> se nenhum prefixo é atribuído ao espaço de nomes URI especificado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>devolvido é atomizado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o nó atual corresponde a expressão XPath especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method has no affect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Este método terá qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node matches the specified XPath expression; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó atual corresponde a expressão XPath especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível avaliar a expressão XPath.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o nó atual corresponde ao especificado <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não tem qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object containing the compiled XPath expression is specified, rather than an XPath expression <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é idêntico para os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, exceto que um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>objeto que contém a expressão XPath compilada for especificado, em vez de uma expressão de XPath <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object containing the compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref> objeto que contém a expressão XPath compilada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó atual corresponde a <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível avaliar a expressão XPath.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath não é válida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para a mesma posição especificada como <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that shares the same implementation and points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve sempre `true` se <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi especificado um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>que partilham os mesmos pontos na mesma instância de documento atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> e implementação</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve sempre `false` se <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi especificado um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>que tenha uma implementação diferente para a atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> positioned on the node that you want to move to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> posicionado no nó que pretende mover para.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida de mover para a mesma posição especificada como <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the attribute with the matching local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o atributo com o nome local correspondente e o espaço de nomes URI.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num elemento, este método devolve `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Após uma chamada com êxito para MoveToAttribute, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>Propriedades refletem os valores do atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num atributo, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the navigator.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do navegador.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>Mover para o próximo nó de atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: Depois de posicionado num atributo, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>Mover para o elemento proprietário.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the attribute; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for an empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI do atributo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para um espaço de nomes vazio.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é mover para o atributo bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the child node of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o nó subordinado a <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToChild method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido do método MoveToChild depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó subordinado para mover para.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the child nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os diferentes <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós e os nós subordinados que podem mover para.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |Current Node's XPathNodeType|Child Node's XPathNodeType| |----------------------------------|--------------------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values|None.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType nó atual | XPathNodeType do nó subordinado | |----------------------------------|--------------------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| | Todos os outros valores de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| None.|</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> do nó subordinado para mover para.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o nó subordinado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the child node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o nó subordinado com o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do nó subordinado para mover para.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI do nó subordinado para mover para.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o nó subordinado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o primeiro nó colateral do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first sibling node of the current node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no first sibling, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida de mover para o primeiro nó colateral do nó atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se não houver nenhuma primeiro colateral ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is already positioned on the first sibling, <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and will not move its position.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> já está posicionado no primeiro colateral <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> irá devolver <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e não irá mover a sua posição.

trans-unit.source: If MoveToFirst returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because there is no first sibling, or if <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se devolver MoveToFirst <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> porque não há nenhum primeiro colateral ou se <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num atributo, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first attribute of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o primeiro atributo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num elemento, este método devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não se altera.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToFirstAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Após uma chamada com êxito para MoveToFirstAttribute, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>Propriedades refletem os valores do atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num atributo, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>Mover para o próximo nó de atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num atributo, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>Mover para o elemento proprietário.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first attribute of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o primeiro atributo do nó atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first child node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o primeiro nó subordinado do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> are the only two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values that can have children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>são as duas apenas <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>valores que podem ter elementos subordinados.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` for all other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node types.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre `false` para todos os outros <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>tipos de nó.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first child node of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o primeiro nó subordinado do nó atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to first namespace node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o primeiro nó de espaço de nomes do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>classe devolve nós de espaço de nomes por ordem inversa documento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, MoveToFirstNamespace essencialmente move para o último nó de espaço de nomes no âmbito atual.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi movido para o nó de espaço de nomes, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>propriedade reflete o nome do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>Mover para o próximo nó de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>para mover novamente para o nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para uma definição de nós de espaço de nomes, consulte a secção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML caminho linguagem XPath localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o primeiro nó de espaço de nomes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first namespace node that matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o primeiro nó de espaço de nomes que corresponda a <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>classe devolve nós de espaço de nomes por ordem inversa documento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, MoveToFirstNamespace essencialmente move para o último nó de espaço de nomes no âmbito atual.

trans-unit.source: Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `data` node, MoveToFirstNamespace behaves in the following manner.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando o fragmento XML do seguinte como exemplo, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no `data` nó, MoveToFirstNamespace comporta-se da seguinte forma.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` movido para um dos seguintes nós de espaço de nomes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, ou `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`.

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` movido para um dos seguintes nós de espaço de nomes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, ou `xmlns:b='B'`.

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` move para o `xmlns:c='C'` nós.

trans-unit.source: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ``` If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ```Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num elemento, este método devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não se altera.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi movido para o nó de espaço de nomes, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>propriedade reflete o nome do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>Mover para o próximo nó de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.

trans-unit.source: - The MoveToFollowing method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: -O método MoveToFollowing move para nós de atributo ou espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, the MoveToFollowing method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>valor do parâmetro é <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, o método MoveToFollowing devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>limites transmitida como um parâmetro não está posicionado depois da posição da atual <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>será ignorada.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>transmitida como um parâmetro de limite é `null` o próximo nó seguinte com especificado <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>está localizado na ordem do documento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>métodos não podem ser utilizados para mover para nós de atributo ou espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>limite transmitida como um parâmetro está posicionado através de um nó de atributo ou espaço de nomes, é equivalente ao <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>parâmetro de limite ter sido posicionado no primeiro nó subordinado do respetivo elemento principal.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que o elemento principal do nó de atributo ou espaço de nomes que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>parâmetro de limite está posicionado no pode ser correspondido através deste método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>método devolve `false`, a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will not move past while searching for the following element.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.

trans-unit.target: O nome local do elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the node that has an attribute of type `ID` whose value matches the specified <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, é movido para o nó que tem um atributo do tipo `ID` cujo valor corresponde a <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> especificado

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to identify nodes by unique `ID` provided the source document explicitly declares attributes of type `ID` using a DTD.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser utilizado para identificar nós pelo exclusivo `ID` fornecido o documento de origem explicitamente declara atributos do tipo `ID` utilizando um DTD.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the following XML data, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, was loaded using a DTD that included the following: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que os seguintes dados XML, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, foi carregadas utilizando um DTD que incluído o seguinte: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was positioned somewhere in the XML data, calling `MoveToId("a1")` positions the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> on the element node `x`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi posicionado algures nos dados XML, chamar `MoveToId("a1")` posições a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>no nó de elemento `x`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the `ID` value of the node to which you want to move.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o `ID` valor do nó para o qual pretende mover.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida mover; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the navigator is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do navegador é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the namespace node with the specified namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o nó de espaço de nomes com o prefixo de espaço de nomes especificado.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>foi movido para o nó de espaço de nomes, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>propriedade reflete o nome do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>Mover para o próximo nó de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>para mover novamente para o nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para uma definição de nós de espaço de nomes, consulte a secção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML caminho linguagem XPath localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the namespace node.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo de espaço de nomes de nó de espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the specified namespace; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a matching namespace node was not found, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida de mover para o espaço de nomes especificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se não foi encontrado um nó de espaço de nomes correspondente ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não está posicionado num nó de elemento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o próximo nó colateral do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o próximo nó colateral; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se existem não existem mais colaterais ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node of the current node that matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o próximo nó colateral do nó atual que corresponda a <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToNext method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido do método MoveToNext depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó colateral seguinte para mover para.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> do nó para mover para colateral.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o próximo nó colateral; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se existem não existem mais colaterais ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o próximo nó colateral com o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O nome local do nó colateral seguinte para mover para.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI do nó colateral seguinte para mover para.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida de mover para o próximo nó colateral; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se existem não existem mais colaterais ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o atributo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an attribute, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num atributo, este método devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não se altera.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> methods are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num atributo, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>métodos não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num atributo, pode chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>Mover para o elemento proprietário.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next attribute; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> for bem sucedida de mover para o atributo seguinte; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se existem não existem mais atributos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o próximo nó de espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>classe devolve nós de espaço de nomes por ordem inversa documento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToNextNamespace essentially moves to the namespace node above the one in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, MoveToNextNamespace essencialmente move o nó de espaço de nomes acima no âmbito atual.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, este método devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não se altera.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, os métodos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>não são aplicáveis.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos sempre devolvem `false` alteram a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, chamada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>para mover novamente para o nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: Para uma definição de nós de espaço de nomes, consulte a secção 5.4 da recomendação W3C XML caminho linguagem XPath localizada em http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o próximo nó de espaço de nomes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next namespace node matching the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para a correspondência de nó de espaço de nomes seguinte o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>classe devolve nós de espaço de nomes por ordem inversa documento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está atualmente posicionado num nó de espaço de nomes, este método devolve `false` e a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não se altera.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> que descrevem o âmbito de espaço de nomes de valor.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> ao nó principal do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToParent method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the parent node to move to.
