trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os diferentes <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós e os nós principais que podem mover para.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Parent Node| |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes do not have parents.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | Principais nó | |-------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| nós <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>não tem elementos principais. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| nó <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| nó <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| nó <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.|</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the parent node of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o nó principal do nó atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the previous sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> ao nó anterior colateral do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the previous sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no previous sibling node or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é bem-sucedida mover para o nó de colateral anterior; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se não existir nenhum nó colateral anterior ou se o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> atualmente está posicionado num nó de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a posição do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the root node that the current node belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> para o nó de raiz que pertence o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: All nodes belong to one and only one document.
trans-unit.target: Todos os nós pertencem a um e apenas um documento.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method is always successful.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, este método é sempre com êxito.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the qualified name of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o nome qualificado do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The Name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O nome devolvido depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the name for the `<bk:book>` element is `bk:book`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome para o `<bk:book>` elemento é `bk:book`.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the Name property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista o valor devolvido pela propriedade Name, com base no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | O valor da propriedade | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O nome qualificado de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<bk:book>`, the name of the element node is `bk:book`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo seguinte, `<bk:book>`, é o nome do nó de elemento `bk:book`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O nome qualificado de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, the name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node is `bk:genre`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The prefix associated with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo seguinte, `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, é o nome do nó <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> `bk:genre`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O prefixo associado com o URI do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following namespace declaration, `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, the Name property returns `bk`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The target of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: No seguinte declaração de espaço de nomes, `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, devolve de propriedade nome `bk`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O destino de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, the Name property returns `xml-stylesheet`.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: No exemplo seguinte, `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, devolve de propriedade nome `xml-stylesheet`. | | Todos os outros <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós |<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. |</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the qualified Name of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o nome qualificado do nó atual, ou <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> se o nó atual não tem um nome (por exemplo, nós de texto ou comentário).</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o URI do nó atual do espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI devolvido depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The NamespaceURI property returns `urn:samples` for the node `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade NamespaceURI `urn:samples` para o nó `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes can have a namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Apenas <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós podem ter um URI de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace URI of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node has no namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o espaço de nomes URI do nó atual, ou <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> se o nó atual não tem nenhum URI de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> stores atomized strings of any local name, namespace URI, and prefix used by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>Atomizado de arquivos de cadeias de qualquer nome local, o espaço de nomes URI e o prefixo utilizado pelo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: This means that when the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> is returned multiple times (like "book"), the same <xref:System.String> object is returned for that <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que, ao mesmo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>é devolvido várias vezes (por exemplo, "book"), o mesmo <xref:System.String>objeto é devolvido para esse <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings, instead of expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: Isto possibilita a escrever código eficiente do que o objeto comparações nestas cadeias, em vez de comparações de cadeias dispendiosas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> object enabling you to get the atomized version of a <xref:System.String> within the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>objeto, permitindo-lhe obter a versão atomized de um <xref:System.String>no documento XML.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer> used for equality comparison of <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>utilizado para a comparação de igualdade de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorComparer property allows <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects to be compared on the basis of position rather than reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: Permite que a propriedade NavigatorComparer <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objetos a ser comparada on the basis of posição em vez de referência para o objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods implemented by this class are based on the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>e <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>métodos implementados por esta classe baseiam-se na posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objetos transmitido como parâmetros.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method implemented by this class uses the properties of the node such as its local name and namespace URI to create a hash code for the node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>Método implementado por esta classe utiliza as propriedades do nó, tais como o respetivo nome local e o espaço de nomes URI para criar um código hash para o nó.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer> used for equality comparison of <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>utilizado para a comparação de igualdade de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> values representing the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> valores que representa o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a marcação que representa a abertura e fecho de etiquetas do nó atual e os nós subordinados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação que representa a abertura e fecho de etiquetas do nó atual e os nós subordinados.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o prefixo de espaço de nomes associado com o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The Prefix property gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de prefixo obtém o prefixo de espaço de nomes associado com o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Prefix property returns `bk` for the `<bk:book>` element.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a propriedade de prefixo devolve `bk` para o `<bk:book>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: If a prefix does not exist, or the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node is not <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, the Prefix property returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir um prefixo, ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó atual não é <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, a propriedade de prefixo devolve <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o prefixo de espaço de nomes associado com o nó atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objecto utilizado para criar um novo nó subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefixação um nó subordinado adiciona um novo nó para o início da lista de nós subordinados para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós subordinados de um elemento, nó prepended torna-se o primeiro nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós subordinados não existirem, em seguida, é criado um novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a considerar ao utilizar o método PrependChild.

trans-unit.source: - The new child node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: -O novo nó subordinado não é inserido até o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>método do <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objeto é chamado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objecto utilizado para criar um novo nó subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado no não permite a um novo nó subordinado ser prepended.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo nó subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual utilizando a cadeia XML especificada.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefixação um nó subordinado adiciona um novo nó para o início da lista de nós subordinados para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós subordinados de um elemento, nó prepended torna-se o primeiro nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós subordinados não existirem, em seguida, é criado um novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um novo nó de elemento, inclua todos os sintaxe XML no parâmetro de cadeia XML.

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `PrependChild("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia para um novo `book` é nó `PrependChild("<book/>")`.

trans-unit.source: The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `PrependChild("book")`.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia para acrescentar o texto "livro" para o nó de texto do nó atual é `PrependChild("book")`.

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: Se a cadeia XML contém vários nós, todos os nós são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a considerar ao utilizar o método PrependChild.

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de dados XML para o novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro da cadeia XML está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado no não permite a um novo nó subordinado ser prepended.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de cadeia XML não é bem formado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo nó subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual utilizando o conteúdo XML a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefixação um nó subordinado adiciona um novo nó para o início da lista de nós subordinados para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós subordinados de um elemento, nó prepended torna-se o primeiro nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós subordinados não existirem, em seguida, é criado um novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a considerar ao utilizar o método PrependChild.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto está posicionado através de uma sequência de nós XML, todos os nós na sequência são adicionados.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto posicionado nos dados XML para o novo nó subordinado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto é um erro de estado ou fechado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>é o parâmetro de objeto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado no não permite a um novo nó subordinado ser prepended.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo XML a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>parâmetro de objeto não está corretamente formado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the nodes in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo nó subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual utilizando os nós no <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefixação um nó subordinado adiciona um novo nó para o início da lista de nós subordinados para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós subordinados de um elemento, nó prepended torna-se o primeiro nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós subordinados não existirem, em seguida, é criado um novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a considerar ao utilizar o método PrependChild.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objeto está posicionado através de uma sequência de nós XML, todos os nós na sequência são adicionados.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChild não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new child node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objeto posicionado no nó para adicionar como o novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> é o parâmetro de objeto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado no não permite a um novo nó subordinado ser prepended.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child element at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo elemento subordinado no início da lista de subordinados de nós do nó atual com o prefixo de espaço de nomes, o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI especificado com o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefixação um nó subordinado adiciona um novo nó para o início da lista de nós subordinados para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando existem três nós subordinados de um elemento, nó prepended torna-se o primeiro nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: Se os nós subordinados não existirem, em seguida, é criado um novo nó subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Prefixo de espaço de nomes e valores URI podem ser obtidos usando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new child `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a seguinte sintaxe prepends um elemento subordinado utilizando o espaço de nomes no âmbito `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` esta ação cria o novo subordinado `<bk:pages/>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChildElement method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a considerar ao utilizar o método PrependChildElement.

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -Se o prefixo de espaço de nomes especificado `null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, em seguida, o prefixo do espaço de nomes URI do novo elemento é obtido a partir de espaços de nomes atuais no âmbito.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um prefixo de espaço de nomes atribuído ao espaço de nomes especificado URI no âmbito atual, em seguida, um prefixo de espaço de nomes é gerado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChildElement method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChildElement só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChildElement method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -O método PrependChildElement não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: O prefixo de espaço de nomes do elemento subordinado novo (se aplicável).

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: O nome local do elemento subordinado novo (se aplicável).

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI do elemento subordinado novo (se aplicável).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>e <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> são equivalentes.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: O valor do elemento subordinado novo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String>ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> são transmitidos vazio elemento é criado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado no não permite a um novo nó subordinado ser prepended.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto que contém o nó atual e os nós subordinados.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is created with the current node and its child nodes, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto é criado com o nó atual e os nós subordinados, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.</xref:System.Xml.ReadState> do objeto</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method is called for the first time, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is moved to the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>método é denominado pela primeira vez, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>é movido para o nó atual de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> do objeto</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object continues to read until the end of the XML tree is reached.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto continua a ler até é atingido o fim da árvore XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: At this point, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method returns `false` and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.
trans-unit.target: Neste momento, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>método devolve `false` e <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.</xref:System.Xml.ReadState> do objeto</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alterar a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are not inserted into the XML stream provided to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Declarações de espaço de nomes para os espaços de nomes no âmbito do nó atual não estão a ser introduzidas no fluxo XML fornecido para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This behavior differs from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este comportamento difere de acordo com o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method creates the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object with specific reader settings, and the module that uses this method has no control over those settings.
trans-unit.target: Este método cria o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto com definições de leitor específico e o módulo que utiliza este método tem não controla essas definições.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: For example, the reader returned by this method prohibits processing Data Type Definitions (DTDs).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o leitor devolvido por este método proíbe a processar as definições de tipo de dados (DTDs).

trans-unit.source: If the reader attempts to read a file that uses a DTD, it will throw an error, <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.
trans-unit.target: Se o leitor tenta ler um ficheiro que utiliza um DTD, este irá gerar um erro, <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlException>

trans-unit.source: The message for the exception will be `Unexpected DTD declaration`.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem para a exceção será `Unexpected DTD declaration`.

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by implementing a custom <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> that returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with the desired <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar este comportamento ao implementar um personalizado <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>que devolve um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>com o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> pretendida</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto que contém o nó atual e os nós subordinados.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element node or the root node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não está posicionado num nó de elemento ou o nó de raiz.

trans-unit.source: Replaces a range of sibling nodes from the current node to the node specified.
trans-unit.target: Substitui um intervalo de nós de colateral do nó atual para o nó especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReplaceRange method replaces a range of sibling nodes from the current node the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on (inclusive) to the node specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parameter (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: O método ReplaceRange substitui um intervalo de nós de colateral do nó atual o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num (inclusive) para o nó especificado pelo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>parâmetro (inclusive).</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The replacement range is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O intervalo de substituição não é inserido até o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>método do <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objeto é chamado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> positioned on the last sibling node in the range to replace.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> posicionado no último nó colateral no intervalo para substituir.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to specify the replacement range.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objecto utilizado para especificar o intervalo de substituição.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> specified is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> specified is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: The last node to replace specified is not a valid sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O último nó para substituir a especificado não é um nó de válido colateral do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current node with the content of the string specified.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o nó atual com o conteúdo de cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the new node on completion of the ReplaceSelf method and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no novo nó após a conclusão do método ReplaceSelf e devolve `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not positioned on the new node after completion of the ReplaceSelf method when the XML input is <xref:System.String.Empty> in which case the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is either positioned on the next sibling node or the parent node if there is no next sibling node to the replaced node and the ReplaceSelf returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está posicionado no novo nó após a conclusão do método ReplaceSelf quando a entrada XML é <xref:System.String.Empty>caso em que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é está posicionado no próximo nó colateral ou o nó principal se existir nenhum nó colateral seguinte para o nó substituído e devolve o ReplaceSelf `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -O método ReplaceSelf só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado numa elemento, nó de comentário, instrução de processamento ou texto.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML data string is not well-formed than an exception is thrown and the result of this method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> on the current node.
trans-unit.target: -Se a cadeia de dados XML não é bem formada que é emitida uma exceção e o resultado deste método é equivalente a chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>no nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first node in the series of nodes.
trans-unit.target: -Se a cadeia XML contém vários nós, todos os nós são adicionados e os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no primeiro nó de série de nós.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is not equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Não é equivalente ao o método ReplaceSelf o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new node.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de dados XML para o novo nó.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro da cadeia XML está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não está posicionado numa elemento, nó de comentário, instrução de processamento ou texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de cadeia XML não é bem formado.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current node with the contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o nó atual com o conteúdo a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the new node on completion of the ReplaceSelf method and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no novo nó após a conclusão do método ReplaceSelf e devolve `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not positioned on the new node after completion of the ReplaceSelf method when the XML input is <xref:System.String.Empty> in which case the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is either positioned on the next sibling node or the parent node if there is no next sibling node to the replaced node and the ReplaceSelf returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não está posicionado no novo nó após a conclusão do método ReplaceSelf quando a entrada XML é <xref:System.String.Empty>caso em que o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é está posicionado no próximo nó colateral ou o nó principal se existir nenhum nó colateral seguinte para o nó substituído e devolve o ReplaceSelf `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -O método ReplaceSelf só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado numa elemento, nó de comentário, instrução de processamento ou texto.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML data string is not well-formed than an exception is thrown and the result of this method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> on the current node.
trans-unit.target: -Se a cadeia de dados XML não é bem formada que é emitida uma exceção e o resultado deste método é equivalente a chamar <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>no nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first node in the series of nodes.
trans-unit.target: -Se a cadeia XML contém vários nós, todos os nós são adicionados e os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no primeiro nó de série de nós.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is not equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Não é equivalente ao o método ReplaceSelf o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto posicionado nos dados XML para o novo nó.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>é o parâmetro de objeto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: Substitui o nó atual com o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema information that has been assigned to the current node as a result of schema validation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de esquema que tem sido atribuídas para o nó atual como resultado da validação de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Schema information can be set on <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or on <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes with a non-`null`<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As informações de esquema podem ser definidas no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, ou no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>nós com um não -`null`<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: If the current node is not one of the above node types, or if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance does not report schema information, the SchemaInfo property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó atual não é um dos tipos de nó acima, ou se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>instância não comunicarão as informações de esquema, a propriedade SchemaInfo devolve `null`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"></xref> object that contains the schema information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém as informações de esquema para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Selects a node set, using the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona um conjunto de nó, utilizando a expressão XPath especificada.

trans-unit.source: The context for the selection is the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: O contexto para a seleção é a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>quando este método é denominado.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> returned represents the set of selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar este método, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>devolvido representa o conjunto de nós selecionados.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> to iterate over the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>método o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>para iterar o conjunto de nó selecionado.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código c# itera o conjunto de nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` The following are important notes to consider when using the Select method.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ```Seguem-se notas importantes a ter em consideração ao utilizar o método Select.

trans-unit.source: - You can still use any of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's navigation methods to move within the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -Pode continuar a utilizar qualquer um dos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>métodos de navegação do objeto para mover dentro <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: Os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>métodos de navegação são independentes de nós selecionados no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - Future calls to the Select method return a new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new Select call.
trans-unit.target: -Futuras chamadas para o método Select devolvem um novo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>objeto que aponta para selecionado conjunto de nós que corresponda a nova chamada selecione.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objects are completely independent of each other.
trans-unit.target: As duas <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>objetos são completamente independentes entre si.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> overload, which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> as its argument.
trans-unit.target: -Se a expressão XPath necessita da resolução de espaço de nomes, utilize o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>sobrecarga, que demora um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>como argumento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: - This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -Este método não tem qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa uma expressão de XPath.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> pointing to the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> apontar para o conjunto de nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression contains an error or its return type is not a node set.
trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath contém um erro ou o respetivo tipo de retorno não é um conjunto de nós.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Selects a node set using the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona um nó definido utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The context for the selection is the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> when you called this method.
trans-unit.target: O contexto para a seleção é a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>quando chamado este método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> returned represents the set of selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar este método, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>devolvido representa o conjunto de nós selecionados.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> to iterate over the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>para iterar o conjunto de nó selecionado.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código c# itera o conjunto de nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ```Seguem-se notas importantes a ter em consideração ao utilizar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You can still use any of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's navigation methods to move within the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -Pode continuar a utilizar qualquer um dos <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>métodos de navegação do objeto para mover dentro <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: Os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>métodos de navegação são independentes de nós selecionados no <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - Future calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method return a new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: -Futuro chamadas para o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>método devolver um novo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>objeto que aponta para o conjunto de nós selecionados que corresponda ao novo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>chamar.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objects are completely independent of each other.
trans-unit.target: As duas <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>objetos são completamente independentes entre si.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method must be called to specify the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>requer o par URI de resolução, o prefixo e espaço de nomes do espaço de nomes tem de ser adicionado a um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>e o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>método tem de ser chamado para especificar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>a utilizar para a resolução do espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que o documento contém os seguintes nós XML.

trans-unit.source: ``` <bookstore xmlns:bk='urn:samples'> <book bk:ISBN='1-325-0980'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ``` In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node.
trans-unit.target: ``` <bookstore xmlns:bk='urn:samples'> <book bk:ISBN='1-325-0980'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ```Neste caso, o seguinte código c# seleciona o `bk:ISBN` nós.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE]> Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>não inclui um prefixo, presume-se que o URI do espaço de nomes é o espaço de nomes vazio.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method and provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se o XML inclui um espaço de nomes predefinido, ainda tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>método e fornecer um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>que contém um prefixo e espaço de nomes URI para lidar com o espaço de nomes predefinido.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have the following XML.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que tem o seguinte XML.

trans-unit.source: ``` <bookstore xmlns="http://www.lucernepublishing.com"> <book> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ``` In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: ``` <bookstore xmlns="http://www.lucernepublishing.com"> <book> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ```Neste caso, o seguinte código c# seleciona todos os nós de livro: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` este método não tem qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object containing the compiled XPath query.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref> objeto que contém a consulta XPath compilada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> that points to the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> que aponta para o conjunto de nó selecionado.

trans-unit.target: A expressão XPath não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the ancestor nodes of the current node that have a matching <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todos os nós predecessor do nó atual que tenham uma correspondência <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectAncestors method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectAncestors não tem qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the ancestor nodes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> de nós predecessor.

trans-unit.source: To include the context node in the selection, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir o nó de contexto na seleção, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> that contains the selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> que contém os nós selecionados.

trans-unit.source: The returned nodes are in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: Os nós devolvido são pela ordem inversa documento.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the ancestor nodes of the current node that have the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todos os nós predecessor do nó atual com o nome local especificado e o espaço de nomes URI.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `name` parameter, all ancestor nodes that belong to the specified namespace URI are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `name` parâmetro, todos os nós de predecessor que pertencem ao espaço de nomes especificado URI estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `namespaceURI` parameter, all ancestor nodes with the specified local name that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `namespaceURI` parâmetro, predecessor todos os nós com o nome local especificado que pertencem a nenhum espaço de nomes estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as both the local name and namespace URI, all ancestor nodes that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>é especificado como o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI, todos os nós de predecessor que pertencem a nenhum espaço de nomes estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SelectAncestors method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectAncestors não tem qualquer efeito sobre o estado da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the ancestor nodes.
trans-unit.target: O nome local de nós predecessor.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the ancestor nodes.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes URI de nós predecessor.

trans-unit.source: To include the context node in the selection, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir o nó de contexto na seleção, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the child nodes of the current node that have the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todos os nós subordinados do nó atual com o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `name` parameter, all child nodes that belong to the specified namespace URI are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `name` parâmetro, todos os nós subordinados que pertençam ao espaço de nomes especificado URI estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `namespaceURI` parameter, all child nodes with the specified local name that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `namespaceURI` parâmetro, subordinado todos os nós com o nome local especificado que pertencem a nenhum espaço de nomes estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If both the local name and namespace URI parameters are <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, all child nodes that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os locais nome e o espaço de nomes URI parâmetros são <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, são selecionados todos os nós subordinados que pertençam a nenhum espaço de nomes.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Selects all the descendant nodes of the current node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todos os nós subordinados do nó atual com o nome local e o espaço de nomes URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `name` parameter, all descendant nodes that belong to the specified namespace URI are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `name` parâmetro, todos os nós subordinados que pertençam ao espaço de nomes especificado URI estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `namespaceURI` parameter, all descendant nodes with the specified local name that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>está especificado como o `namespaceURI` parâmetro, todos os nós subordinados com o nome local especificado pertence a nenhum espaço de nomes estão selecionadas.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If both the local name and namespace URI parameters are <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, all descendant nodes that belong to no namespace are selected.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os locais nome e o espaço de nomes URI parâmetros são <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, são selecionados todos os nós subordinados que pertençam a nenhum espaço de nomes.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A descendant is a child or a child of a child and so on; thus the selected nodes will never contain attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: Um predecessor é um elemento subordinado ou um subordinado de um elemento subordinado e assim sucessivamente; Assim, os nós selecionados nunca irão conter nós de atributo ou espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The SelectDescendants method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectSingleNode method selects the first node that matches the XPath query in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectSingleNode seleciona o primeiro nó que corresponda a consulta XPath a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing an XPath expression.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object that contains the first matching node for the XPath query specified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no query results.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> consultar o objeto que contém o primeiro nó correspondente para o XPath especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se existem não existem resultados de consulta.

trans-unit.source: The SelectSingleNode method selects the first node that matches the XPath query specified.

trans-unit.source: The SelectSingleNode method uses the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: O método SelectSingleNode utiliza o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>objeto para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In XPath all namespaces must be prefixed in a query.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > No XPath todos os espaços de nomes tem de ter o prefixo numa consulta.

trans-unit.source: If an XML document uses a default namespace, you must still add a namespace prefix to the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: Se um documento XML utiliza um espaço de nomes predefinido, ainda tem de adicionar um prefixo de espaço de nomes para o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object that contains the first matching node for the XPath query specified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no query results.
