trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XPath query or the return type of the XPath expression is not a node.
trans-unit.target: Foi encontrado um erro na consulta XPath ou o tipo de retorno da expressão XPath não é um nó.

trans-unit.source: The XPath query is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A consulta XPath não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Sets the typed value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor digitado do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object is created as the result of a schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the value specified to the SetTypedValue method is verified against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema for the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto é criado como resultado de uma validação de esquema <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto, o valor especificado para o método SetTypedValue é verificado contra o esquema de linguagem de definição de esquema de XML (XSD) para o documento XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the value specified is invalid according to the schema for the XML document, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor especificado é inválido de acordo com o esquema para o documento XML, um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>é emitida.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>

trans-unit.source: The SetTypedValue method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element or attribute node.
trans-unit.target: O método SetTypedValue só é válido quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento ou atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The new typed value of the node.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor de tipo do nó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support the type of the object specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta o tipo de objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value specified cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element or attribute node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não está posicionado num nó de elemento ou atributo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node with complex content (child elements), calling the SetValue method replaces the child elements with a text node containing the new string value.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado num nó de elemento com conteúdo complexo (elementos subordinados), ao chamar o substitui o método SetValue os elementos subordinados com um nó de texto que contém o novo valor de cadeia.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The SetValue method cannot update the root node or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: -O método SetValue não é possível atualizar o nó de raiz ou nós de espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the node.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do nó.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de valor é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on the root node, a namespace node, or the specified value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> está posicionado num nó de raiz, um nó de espaço de nomes ou especificado o valor é inválido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> não suporta a edição.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new copy of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova cópia do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.ICloneable>interface.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new copy of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova cópia do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de texto do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The content returned by the ToString method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the node.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo devolvido pelo método ToString depende o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>do nó.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> of the root node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The value of the attribute.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The content of the text node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The entire content excluding the target.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The content of the comment.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The white space between mark-up.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The white space between markup in a mixed content model, or white space within an `xml:space='preserve'` scope.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | O valor da propriedade | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A>Do nó raiz. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A>Do elemento. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O valor do atributo. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O conteúdo do nó de texto. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Todo o conteúdo, excluindo o destino. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O conteúdo do comentário. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O espaço em branco entre marcar. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| O espaço em branco entre markup num modelo de conteúdo misto ou espaço em branco dentro de um `xml:space='preserve'` âmbito. |</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the text value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> que contém o valor de texto do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó atual como um objeto de objectos do tipo mais adequado do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For attributes and elements with atomic simple type or simple text content, the TypedValue property returns a boxed <xref:System.Object> of the most appropriate .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Para os atributos e elementos com atómico tipo simples ou conteúdo de texto simples, a propriedade TypedValue devolve um boxed <xref:System.Object>do .NET Framework mais adequado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the element or attribute's content is a list type, the TypedValue property returns an array of objects of the most appropriate .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Se o elemento ou conteúdo do atributo é um tipo de lista, a propriedade TypedValue devolve uma matriz de objetos do .NET Framework mais adequado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the TypedValue returned by each <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve o TypedValue devolvido por cada <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|TypedValue Returned| |-------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|Returns a <xref:System.String> object containing all <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node descendants of the document, concatenated and separated by white space.
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | TypedValue devolvida | |-------------------|-------------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Devolve um <xref:System.String>objeto que contém todos os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>descendentes de nó do documento, concatenado e separados por espaços em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: If the document does not have any <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node children, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: Se o documento não tem elementos subordinados do nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, é devolvido <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: (typed or simple content)|Returns an <xref:System.Object> that represents the typed value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: (conteúdo escrito ou simple) | Devolve um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor de tipo de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is defined as an XML Schema list data type, then the node value is exposed as an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>está definido como um tipo de dados de lista de esquema XML, em seguida, o valor do nó está exposto como uma matriz de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Object> in the array contains the typed value of a child of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Object>na matriz contém o valor digitado de um elemento subordinado do elemento. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: (untyped, mixed, or complex content)|Returns a <xref:System.String> object containing all <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node descendants of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> (including string representations of typed values), concatenated and separated by white space.
trans-unit.target: (conteúdo sem tipo, misto ou complexo) | Devolve um <xref:System.String>objeto que contém todos os <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>descendentes de nó do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>(incluindo representações de cadeia dos valores escritos), concatenado e separados por espaços em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> does not have any <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node children, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>não tem elementos subordinados do nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, é devolvido <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: (typed or simple content)|Returns an <xref:System.Object> that represents the typed value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: (conteúdo escrito ou simple) | Devolve um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor de tipo de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> is boxed as a .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>é boxed como um .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>valor.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is defined as an XML Schema list data type, the node value is exposed as an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>está definido como um tipo de dados de lista de esquema XML, o valor do nó está exposto como uma matriz de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Object> in the array contains the typed value of a child of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the content of the comments, excluding the surrounding `<!--` and `-->`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the content of the processing instruction, excluding the target and surrounding `<?` and `?>`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the namespace name.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text of the node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text of the node.|
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Object>na matriz contém o valor digitado de um elemento subordinado do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Um objeto de <xref:System.String>que contém o texto. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Um objeto de <xref:System.String>que contém o conteúdo de comentários, excluindo o envolvente `<!--` e `-->`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Um <xref:System.String>de objeto que contém o conteúdo de instrução de processamento, excluindo o destino e envolvente `<?` e `?>`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Um objeto de <xref:System.String>que contém o nome de espaço de nomes. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| Um objeto de <xref:System.String>que contém o texto do nó. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| A <xref:System.String>objeto que contém o texto do nó. |</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The current node as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual como um objeto de objectos do tipo mais adequado do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado por <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> implementações que fornecem um XML "virtualizado" ver através de um arquivo, para fornecer acesso a objetos subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property can be used by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UnderlyingObject pode ser utilizada por <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>implementações que fornecem um XML "virtualizado" ver através de um arquivo, para fornecer acesso a objetos subjacentes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objeto é utilizado para fornecer uma vista XML virtual através de um gráfico de objeto do Common Language Runtime (CLR), pode pretender efetuar consultas XPath utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>método e, em seguida, aceder aos objetos CLR subjacente nós selecionados.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property would expose these underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UnderlyingObject seria expõem estes subjacente objetos.

trans-unit.source: In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the UnderlyingObject property will always be implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: Em muitos casos, este valor será `null`, e o objeto devolvido pela propriedade UnderlyingObject será sempre implementação específica.

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UnderlyingObject deverá preservar a identidade do objeto e só deve ser utilizada para devolver objetos que tenham uma correspondência de um para um e-mail para os respetivos itens overlaid.

trans-unit.source: A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object or a cloned one.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador deve sempre obter o mesmo objeto nas visitas sucessivas, ao mesmo nó com o mesmo <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objeto ou um clonado.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The UnderlyingObject property of an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object created by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object returns the corresponding <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UnderlyingObject a propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objeto criado por um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto devolve o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> correspondente</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as the <xref:System.Type> specified, using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como o <xref:System.Type>especificado, utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>o objeto especificado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A> method attempts to convert the value of the current node to the .NET Framework type, specified according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the current node's type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>método tenta converter o valor do nó atual para o .NET Framework, foi especificado um tipo de acordo com as regras de XPath 2.0 para a conversão de tipo de nó atual.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>objeto é utilizado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes relacionados com conversões de tipo.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, ao converter um `xs:QName` para um `xs:string`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to return the current node's value as.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>Para devolver atual do nó valor executados.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>utilizado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes de objeto.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The value of the current node as the <xref:System.Type> requested.
trans-unit.target: O valor do nó atual como o <xref:System.Type>pedida.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: O valor do nó atual não está no formato correto para o tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentada não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:boolean` type, the ValueAsBoolean property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Boolean> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem informações de esquema ou tipo (por exemplo, a partir de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto inicializado com um esquema XML ao validar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), e se o nó atual está definido como um esquema XML `xs:boolean` tipo, a propriedade ValueAsBoolean devolve o valor do nó atual como um unboxed <xref:System.Boolean>objeto.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.Boolean> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:boolean`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não possui quaisquer informações de esquema ou tipo, ValueAsBoolean propriedade tenta converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Boolean>valor, de acordo com as regras de conversão XPath 2.0 para `xs:boolean`.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Boolean>não é válido.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:datetime` type, the ValueAsDateTime property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem informações de esquema ou tipo (por exemplo, a partir de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto inicializado com um esquema XML ao validar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), e se o nó atual está definido como um esquema XML `xs:datetime` tipo, a propriedade ValueAsDateTime devolve o valor do nó atual como um unboxed <xref:System.DateTime>objeto.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.DateTime> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:datetime`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não possui quaisquer informações de esquema ou tipo, ValueAsDateTime propriedade tenta converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.DateTime>valor, de acordo com as regras de conversão XPath 2.0 para `xs:datetime`.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.DateTime>não é válido.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:double` type, the ValueAsDouble property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Double> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem informações de esquema ou tipo (por exemplo, a partir de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto inicializado com um esquema XML ao validar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), e se o nó atual está definido como um esquema XML `xs:double` tipo, a propriedade ValueAsDouble devolve o valor do nó atual como um unboxed <xref:System.Double>objeto.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.Double> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xsd:double`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não possui quaisquer informações de esquema ou tipo, ValueAsDouble propriedade tenta converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Double>valor, de acordo com as regras de conversão XPath 2.0 para `xsd:double`.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Double>não é válido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the ValueAsInt property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem informações de esquema ou tipo (por exemplo, a partir de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto inicializado com um esquema XML ao validar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), e se o nó atual está definido como um esquema XML `xs:integer` tipo, a propriedade ValueAsInt devolve o valor do nó atual como um unboxed <xref:System.Int32>objeto.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.Int32> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:integer`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não possui quaisquer informações de esquema ou tipo, ValueAsInt propriedade tenta converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Int32>valor, de acordo com as regras de conversão XPath 2.0 para `xs:integer`.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Int32>não é válido.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the ValueAsLong property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Int64> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>tem informações de esquema ou tipo (por exemplo, a partir de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objeto inicializado com um esquema XML ao validar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), e se o nó atual está definido como um esquema XML `xs:integer` tipo, a propriedade ValueAsLong devolve o valor do nó atual como um unboxed <xref:System.Int64>objeto.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.Int64> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:integer`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>não possui quaisquer informações de esquema ou tipo, ValueAsLong propriedade tenta converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Int64>valor, de acordo com as regras de conversão XPath 2.0 para `xs:integer`.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: Valor do nó atual como um <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.Int64>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível converter o valor da cadeia do nó atual para um <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: A conversão tentativa para <xref:System.Int64>não é válido.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>do nó atual.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> property gets the .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the typed value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>propriedade obtém o .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>do valor com tipo de nó atual.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um elemento do tipo `xs:int` teria um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>de <xref:System.Int32>por predefinição.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>pode ser qualquer um dos tipos válidos que podem ser mapeadas para `xs:int` como <xref:System.Int16>ou <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`.
trans-unit.target: Se um nó não tem nenhum tipo, isto é equivalente da anotação de tipo no nó a ser `xdt:untypedAtomic`.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the ValueType property returns a string for the node.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, a propriedade ValueType devolve uma cadeia para o nó.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipo de suporte nas Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>do nó atual.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Streams the current node and its child nodes to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified.
trans-unit.target: O nó atual e os nós subordinados para as sequências de <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Declarações de espaço de nomes para os espaços de nomes no âmbito do nó atual são inseridas o XML de transmissão em fluxo para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the WriteSubtree method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o método WriteSubtree é chamado no primeiro `book` elemento do `books.xml` ficheiro, o `http://www.contoso.com/books` efetuada na parte superior do documento XML de declaração de espaço de nomes será apresentado no XML de transmissão em fluxo para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>o objeto especificado conforme mostrado no exemplo seguinte.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: ``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <book genre="autobiography" publicationdate="1981" ISBN="1-861003-11-0" xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"> <title>The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin</title> <author> <first-name>Benjamin</first-name> <last-name>Franklin</last-name> </author> <price>8.99</price> </book> ``` > [!NOTE] > The WriteSubtree method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: ``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <book genre="autobiography" publicationdate="1981" ISBN="1-861003-11-0" xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"> <title>The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin</title> <author> <first-name>Benjamin</first-name> <last-name>Franklin</last-name> </author> <price>8.99</price> </book> ``` > [!NOTE]> O método WriteSubtree não afeta a posição do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to stream to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>objeto fluxo para.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the `xml:lang` scope for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o `xml:lang` âmbito para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: In the example XML below, when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `name` element, the XmlLang property returns a scope of `en-us` indicating that the node is in the scope of a `xml:lang="en-us"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo abaixo, XML quando o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está posicionado no `name` elemento, a propriedade XmlLang devolve um âmbito de `en-us` que indica que o nó no âmbito de um `xml:lang="en-us"` atributo.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the `xml:lang` scope, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node has no `xml:lang` scope value to return.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o valor do `xml:lang` âmbito, ou <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> se o nó atual não tenha `xml:lang` valor para devolver o âmbito.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> informações para o nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the XmlType property.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se notas importantes a ter em consideração ao utilizar a propriedade XmlType.

trans-unit.source: - The XmlType property is `null`, unless the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -A propriedade XmlType é `null`, a menos que a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>propriedade da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está definida como <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this node is valid, the XmlType property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, unless this node is a member of a union.
trans-unit.target: -Se este nó for válido, a propriedade XmlType é igual a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, a menos que este nó é um membro de uma União.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this node is a member of a union, the XmlType property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -Se este nó é um membro de uma União, a propriedade XmlType é o mesmo que a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>propriedade da <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> object; default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> objeto; a predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
